title: Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 announced: All the killer features it's bringing to your next phone
description: The newly-announced Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 promises smarter AI, richer gaming and faster connectivity, all while using less power.

title: Apple launches rare deal on MacBook Pro for business
description: With no new laptops for the holiday season, the tech giant is discounting its current Macbook line-up.

title: GitHub doesn't want users to name and shame security flaws any more
description: Disclosing flaws can now be done quietly and away from the public eye.

title: Sir Tim Berners-Lee offers grand vision for internet's future
description: The founder of the web has grand visions for security and privacy under a new standard called Solid.

title: Goodbye freeloaders: Netflix enables remote logout
description: Netflix just enabled remote logout

title: Twitter faces privacy scrutiny over claims it fails GDPR
description: Twitter is in the news again, this time because the company isn’t meeting GDPR criteria in the EU.

title: VLC Player has been unbanned in India
description: The media player app's developers VideoLAN say they’re still in the dark as to why it was banned in the first place.

title: Intel Raptor Lake mobile CPUs leaked – could these be the future of laptops?
description: Core i9-13900HX bristles with no fewer than 24-cores and boosts up to 5.4GHz, if rumors are right.

title: Microsoft's latest updates breaking a vital business security tool
description: The Kerberos authentication protocol is having issues, and a fix is weeks away.

title: Can audiophile open-back headphones ever benefit from Bluetooth? Grado thinks so
description: Grado’s GW100x open-back wireless headphones with Bluetooth 5.2 are a weird but intriguing idea.

title: These are officially the worst passwords we're all still using
description: Easy-to-guess passwords and profanities top list of worst passwords still in use.

title: PureVPN's rebrand goes way beyond a new logo
description: PureVPN's shiny new rebrand isn't just cosmetic – the provider has also updated its suite to include a number of fresh security products.

title: Adobe: CIOs increasing investment in digital workflows
description: As hybrid working looks set to continue, investment towards making workflows more efficient proceeds

title: US government apps found using Russian code
description: A Russian firm claiming to be based in the States ended up developing code used by the US Army, amongst others.

title: Opera update adds built-in TikTok support to help scratch that scrolling itch
description: If you've found yourself reaching for your phone to check TikTok, Opera can let you do it within its browser instead.

title: AMD throws shade at Nvidia RTX 4080 while boasting about beastly RDNA 3 GPUs
description: AMD isn’t being shy about taking Nvidia to task in the next-gen graphics card wars, that’s for sure.

title: Amazon Black Friday sale dates announced - and upcoming deals revealed
description: Amazon has announced the start dates for its Black Friday sales in both the US and UK for 2022.

title: Massive adware campaign spoofs top brands to trick users
description: A major campaign was found abusing hundreds of top brands with thousands of fake websites.

title: Gmail's next free update will make it easier to track your deliveries
description: The next free Gmail update will make it easier to track your deliveries as the order status will appear in the app.

title: Bad news – Nvidia RTX 4080 GPU pricing now looks even more ominous
description: If you’re hoping to get hold of an RTX 4080, early pricing is certainly not hinting that this GPU will go easy on your wallet.

title: Leaving Netflix in December 2022: 3 pulse-pounding thrillers you can't miss
description: We pick out three star-studded thriller movies to watch on Netflix before they leave the service in December.

title: Google Pixel Fold leak shows promising cameras but an underwhelming design
description: A massive Google Pixel Fold leak has shown off the possible design in full, and also revealed some specs.

title: WhatsApp betas on Android make it easier to talk to yourself
description: One beta introduces Companion Mode for connecting multiple phones, while the other revamps self-messaging.
